full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Request for Proposal: Isoperibol Calorimeter
### Amendment No. 3 - Revised Closing Time
### Reference Number: WS3731610520 - Doc3778050958

**Tender Information**

* Tender Closing Date: January 6, 2023, at 14:00 EST
* Expiration Notice: Expired
* Procurement Category: Government of Canada (GD)

**Commodity Details**

* Commodity Code: *41113000 - Chemical evaluation instruments and supplies
* Expected Contract Start Date: January 16, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2023

**Contract Details**

* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery: *Alberta

**Contractor Information**

* Contracting Entity Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5

**Tender Description**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting proposals for the acquisition of an isoperibol calorimeter for the Canadian Wood Fibre Centre, Edmonton, AB. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the revised closing time of January 6, 2023, at 14:00 EST. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

**Ollege Original**

**Contact Information**
* Nancy Baessler (SPAC/PSPC)
* nancy.baessler@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Re**
Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14825405?extsite=MTQ4MjU0MDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please submit your bid via Ariba Discovery before the revised closing time to ensure it is considered.
